title: ESA continues talks with NASA on ExoMars cooperation
summary: The European Space Agency is continuing discussions with NASA on how the agencies can work together to revive ESA’s ExoMars mission after ending cooperation with Russia.

title: Space Force to shore up cybersecurity as threats proliferate
summary: The most likely form of attack facing satellite networks does not happen in space but on the ground, where hackers seek to exploit vulnerabilities.

title: NASA’s SLS moon rocket, SpaceX’s Falcon 9 share the scene at Kennedy Space Center
summary: NASA’s Artemis 1 moon rocket and SpaceX’s Falcon 9 shared the scene Wednesday at the Kennedy Space Center — the first time since 2009 that rockets have stood on both pads at Launch Complex 39.

title: As Russia prepared to invade, U.S. opened commercial imagery pipeline to Ukraine
summary: Leading up to Russia's invasion of Ukraine, U.S. intelligence agencies more than doubled its procurement of commercial electro-optical imagery

title: NASA Selects Universities for Space Station Research Opportunities
summary: Five universities were chosen by NASA for grants to provide students with opportunities to design research experiments that will be conducted on the International Space Station.
